content.value:
I got COVID and missed the actual dates, so girlfriend and I decided to do a little delayed christmas/nye fusion this weekend ðŸ¥°

Feeling especially grateful because arguably the best thing to happen to me in 2021 was her.

photo.alt: Mirror selfie showing off our matching Christmas pajamas.
A meat and cheese platter on a pig-shaped cutting board.
NYE themed donuts from the popular vegan Berlin shop.
The view from our couch that shows A Muppet Christmas Carol on the TV. You can also see our tree and some gifts on the table.
